info.name: AI Business Portal API - Phase 1, 2, 2.5 & 3.2
info.description: Complete API testing collection for AI Business Portal with Auth, AI Text Writer, Socket.IO, Subscription, Payment, Analytics, and AI Chatbot Builder. Includes: Collection Management, Document Updates, Chatbot Configuration Updates, Widget Settings, Ollama Integration Support, and Enhanced RAG Query Responses.

request.description: Get all ChromaDB collections. Useful for debugging and admin purposes.
Get detailed information about a specific ChromaDB collection including sample data.
Update chatbot name, description, or configuration. All fields are optional.

body.description: Text content to train the chatbot (max 1MB). Text will be chunked and embedded for RAG. Supports batch processing for better performance.

request.description: Train chatbot with plain text. Text is automatically chunked and embedded. Works with both OpenAI and Ollama embeddings. Supports concurrent training prevention (will fail if chatbot is already training).

query.description: Number of documents to return (default: 50, max: 200)
Optional: Search term to filter documents

request.description: Get all documents in chatbot's collection with pagination and optional search.

variable.description: Document ID from collection (get from Get Chatbot Documents endpoint)

request.description: Update a specific document in the chatbot's collection. The document ID can be obtained from the Get Chatbot Documents endpoint.
Delete multiple documents from chatbot's collection. Maximum 100 documents per request.

body.description: Query can be in any language (English, Hindi, etc.). Response will be direct answer without 'Question:' or 'Answer:' format labels.

request.description: Query chatbot with RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation). Supports both OpenAI and Ollama providers. Works for chatbots in 'active' or 'training' status. Responses are cleaned and formatted - direct answers without 'Question:' or 'Answer:' labels. Supports multilingual queries (English, Hindi, etc.).
Update widget settings: enable/disable, regenerate API key, or customize theme. Set regenerateApiKey to true to generate a new API key.

Public endpoint for widget queries. Requires widget API key (not JWT token). Works for chatbots in 'active' or 'training' status. Responses are cleaned and formatted without 'Question:' or 'Answer:' labels.
